name: SDSI_XS_BAT_PROVSION_MISMATCHING_CAP
summary: Read sdsi status register after provision CAP for socket 0, verify if SDSI feature is enabled
link: How to apply for CAP for each socket_id: https://wiki.ith.intel.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1635479264
tips: Need CAP file applied for each socket_id, e.g. looks like B760ABF468C2E7FF_key_id_1_rev_1_SG01.bin, user is only allowed to attempt doing provision twice per socket, no matter success or failure, if update available reports 0 means user need to power off and power on to clear sdsi counters (reboot does not work)
